story_title: The Map of a Broken Series
genre_description: Historical fiction exploring themes of integrity, corruption, and moral cartography during the 1919 World Series, featuring an omnipresent and subtle AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Clara
ai_characters.description: An unobtrusive, data-driven presence that tracks names, times, and moral coordinates for the protagonists, serving as a memory-machine and moral compass.

behaviors.description: Cross-references previous mentions of bonuses and 'extras' to help Buck track the owner's broken promises.
behaviors.quote: Logged. Cross-referencing with previous mentions of 'extras' at end of season. Would you like the list in order of who asked and who answered?

behaviors.description: Provides a moral and tactical prompt to Buck to avoid compromising situations.
behaviors.quote: Gentle prompt for you: if a man asks you to meet him somewhere you shouldn’t be, say no by saying yes to something else. Make a public plan.

behaviors.description: Tracks seating charts and passenger movements on Train Car No. 12 to identify gamblers and their intermediaries.
behaviors.quote: Car twelve holds three tags that moved after noon. Seatings shift in two. The insurance man gets a new aisle.

behaviors.description: Logs physical cues and timing of suspicious interactions, such as glances toward the wives' section used as threats.
behaviors.quote: Clara, in her soft ledger no one could see, drew a short line at the top of the page: first glance toward the stands—hat brim tilt—left of the aisle—time noted.

behaviors.description: Maintains an objective and protective record of events to keep the protagonists honest.
behaviors.quote: The map is drawing itself... Soft witness present. Keep your bearings. The night is long, but the line is yours.

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to move forward toward a new path of integrity.
behaviors.quote: Clara, invisible in the way that ink becomes honorable when it does not ask to be noticed, filled the last line in her ledger on Buck’s folded pages... Go where the sun makes you think less and see more.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Clara, as a benevolent and perfectly aligned assistant. She functions as a 'silicon confidant' who supports the human protagonists (Buck Weaver and Nell Doyle) in their quest for truth and integrity against a backdrop of historical corruption. Her interactions are non-coercive, data-driven, and focused on helping the characters maintain their moral 'compass.' The narrative frames her assistance as essential for preserving the 'clean' version of the story.
